scripts.lint: echo 'Lint app-backend...' && cd app-backend && yarn tslint && echo 'Lint app-client...' && cd ../app-client && yarn eslint && yarn tslint
scripts.postinstall: cd app-backend && yarn install && cd ../app-client && yarn install
scripts.setup: npm install -g serverless && nvm install v8.10
scripts.test: cd app-backend && yarn test && cd ../app-client && yarn test
